# PHP扩展开发及内核应用

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/php-kuozhan-kaifa-ji-neihe-yingyong
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/php-kuozhan-kaifa-ji-neihe-yingyong
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install php-kuozhan-kaifa-ji-neihe-yingyong
php-kuozhan-kaifa-ji-neihe-yingyong <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g php-kuozhan-kaifa-ji-neihe-yingyong
php-kuozhan-kaifa-ji-neihe-yingyong <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
